Author: whatluke
Title: [ANN][ICO] NordCoin - Your trusted & safe mobile cryptocurrency mining operation
Body: Website | Telegram | Whitepaper | Medium | Reddit | Github | Twitter | Facebook | LinkedIn | Youtube | Instagram |  What is Nordcoin?  The Mobile Mining Container (MMC) technology developed by NordCoin is a self-sufficient self-contained, remote controlled crypto-mining solution designed to overcome the three most significant variables affecting the profitability of crypto-mining: effective hash rate, cost of energy, and cost of space.   Video explanation     Highlights  4 Proof of concept containers already delivered and in operation  30 mining containers will be activated  Est. yield a net profit of approximately $45,000 worth of cryptocurrencies per month per container  Audited by big four consulting firm   Technology and innovation stack   Working with world-class hardware (Bitmain AntMiner)  Custom-built cooling system which have been upgraded as-we-go and has been tested in temperatures between -25 C and up to +30 C  Miners are placed in a standard 40ft shipping container which can be deployed directly in electricity source    Token name and ticker symbol NRDC ICO (public sale) 16.7.2018-16.8.2018 Hard cap $10,965,000 Token classification Utility Total token supply 12,900,000 Total tokens for sale 10,965,000 Token type ERC20 Issuing jurisdiction Estonia
